No. 72746 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 14, 2018

BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York, AS TRUSTEE FOR the CERTIFICATEHOLDERS CWALT, INC., Alternative Loan Trust 2006-23CB Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-23CB, Appellant,
v.
SATICOY BAY LLC, SERIES 6629 TUMBLEWEED RIDGE 103 TRUST, Respondent.

AFFIRMED.
